content.prompt: Which of the following best explains why many Europeans maintained a belief in the benefits of scientific progress throughout the twentieth century?

choices.label: New advances in science challenged previously held certainties about the universe.
New communications technology allowed for greater imports of foreign culture.
New technological developments made significant material improvements in the lives of most Europeans.
New technologies deployed in warfare reinforced Social Darwinist beliefs regarding European superiority.

skill.text: Skill 5.B: Explain how a historical development or process relates to another historical development or process.
